stopMsg: Are you sure you want to stop?
ttsExampleText: The birch canoe slid on the smooth planks.
ttsNotEnabled: Text-to-Speech is not enabled. If you are using Chromium please try launching with `chromium-browser --enable-speech-dispatcher` from the console. See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44013933/how-to-use-web-speech-api-at-chromium for more information.
